com.mk4droid.IMC_Services

Class Security

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mk4droid.IMC_Services.Security

  • public class Security
extends java.lang.Object
    Authenticate the user using a username and password. Password is sent encrypted using the Constants.EncKey See EncWrapper.

           java.lang.String Password_in,
           android.content.res.Resources resources,
           android.content.Context ctx_in,
           boolean updVotes_in)
        Authenticate user using username and password. Password is encrypted and then sent.
        Parameters:
        Username - latin characters
        Password - actual password up to 16 chars (latin characters)
        resources - for UI
        ctx - for current Android activity
